content: Just found out that after paying my estimated taxes ($5k-ish), I only owe $2–3k more (depending on if I do the SEP, which I probs will). I am SUPER RELIEVED to only owe $2–3k!! I was positive it was going to be like…$10k. Like, I told myself I wouldn’t cry if it was under $5k. Time to go hug my accountant.
